application.goToProfile: Welcome, Brother. You are at kopnik.org. To begin, go through the registration, after which all the features of the system will become available.

profile.submitMessage: Your request for kopnik.org membership has been sent to your witness. Now go to VKontakte and read how to communicate with your witness and confirm the accuracy of sended data. Good luck!

messagesFromGroup.allow: By clicking the button below to turn on the nationwide system

criteria: There is a Son who has a family

There is a farm (own business / work)
